title: Cerebras and Abu Dhabi's M42 made an LLM dedicated to answering medical questions
description: The open-source Med42 neural net was fine-tuned with a data set of 700,000 question and answer pairs.

title: The 5 best gaming TVs of 2023
description: The best gaming TVs elevate your gaming experience with enhanced color and contrast as well as VRR support for smoother gameplay.

title: I tried to return something to Temu. Here's what happened
description: Wondering whether you can return your Temu purchases? You can as long as you follow a few important rules.

title: Super-long-term stable Linux Kernel arrives
description: If your Linux plans include industrial infrastructure, power grids, and factories, the Linux Foundation's Civil Infrastructure Platform has a Linux kernel just for you with decade-long support.

title: The best Sony TVs of 2023
description: The best Sony TVs are known for their premium picture and audio quality, and OLED screens. Here's how to choose the right one for you.

title: Invest in lifelong learning with this $100 membership
description: Upskillist provides courses on a wide range of topics related to numerous industries. Grow your skills now with this discounted $100 membership for a limited time.

title: Generative AI spending to reach $143 billion in 2027, says IDC
description: The forecasted growth of generative AI investments is more than twice the growth rate in overall AI spending and 13 times greater than the CAGR for worldwide IT spending over the same period, according to IDC.

title: Opera One now allows you to do even more with AI
description: The Opera browser continues to innovate around AI technology. With the latest release, you'll find new tools to make using the built-in Aria AI feature even easier.

title: TikTok will automatically enable captions on every video uploaded
description: It's a major leap in accessibility and a plus for people who watch with the sound off, but it can add a step or two for creators.

description: Using the AI in ChatGPT,  My AI eBook Creation Pro helps you write an entire e-book with just three clicks-- no writing or technical experience required.

title: The best Samsung TVs of 2023
description: The best Samsung TVs range from the budget-friendly to the premium. Whether you're a binge-watcher, a movie buff, or a console gamer, we'll help you find the right Samsung TV model for you.

description: ZDNET rounded up the best LG TV models on the market now to help you choose the right one for you (and if you need an OLED screen).

title: Generative AI is everything, everywhere, all at once
description: Businesses want in on generative AI and are willing to do anything to ride the wave.

title: The best smart TVs of 2023
description: The best smart TVs come with a suite of preloaded, popular apps like Netflix, Hulu, and Disney+, so you can start streaming right out of the box.

title: Equinix's data center system upgrade results in hours-long disruption at banks
description: A glitch in a scheduled 'chilled water system' upgrade disrupted operations for Equinix's data center customers, including two banks in Singapore.

title: Flipper Zero can be used to crash iPhones running iOS 17, but there's a way to foil the attack
description: It basically performs a denial of service (DoS) attack on iPhones. Here's how it works and what you can do to protect your phone.

title: How to enable speech-to-text in Linux with this simple app
description: If you'd like to add speech-to-text on the Linux operating system it's much easier than you might think, with the help of a simple Flatpak app.

title: AI aims to predict and fix developer coding errors before disaster strikes
description: Generative AI can be combined with more traditional forms of artificial intelligence to predict how computer systems may fail before applications are put into production, according to Dynatrace's CTO.

title: Microsoft unveils extensions to Fabric, Azure for healthcare AI
description: These new offerings seek to bring together multiple modalities of medical data for greater analysis, and also bring large language models to clinicians' side as medical copilots.

title: The best 75-inch TVs of 2023: Expert tested
description: ZDNET tested the best 75-inch TVs on the market, including budget-friendly options from Hisense and premium models from Samsung, LG, and Sony.

title: iPhone 15 Pro Max users are reporting burn-in problems with the OLED display
description: Several accounts of screen burn-in point to ongoing quality control issues with the latest, most expensive iPhone model.

title: How to turn on flash notifications on Android 14 (and why you should)
description: Never miss a notification again with this Android setting.

title: Singapore and US sync up on AI governance and set up joint group
description: Both nations have mapped their respective AI governance frameworks to ease compliance and they will also establish a group to exchange insights on responsible innovation.
